channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Hello, I'm John. I'm working on my server and well to tell the truth I'm not the best coder out there.
I need help with a few things:
First off, where are all those files such as NPCDef.xml and NPCs.rscd?
How do I get range and mage to work? Please, just get me started. I'd like to learn and be helped.
How do I fix the weapons so they are correctly equipped and used?

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:1, topic:333680”]Hello, I’m John. I’m working on my server and well to tell the truth I’m not the best coder out there.

I need help with a few things:

First off, where are all those files such as NPCDef.xml and NPCs.rscd?

How do I get range and mage to work? Please, just get me started. I’d like to learn and be helped.

How do I fix the weapons so they are correctly equipped and used?[/quote]

.rscd are found in the client config folder, i think its clientfolder/conf/client/… XML’s are found in the server, should be in the config folder of server directory.

What source are you using? range and magic should already work in most sources…

Sorry cant help you on last question, im not familiar with wielding weapons

Read full topic
